name: Enigma Manor
description:
Enigma Manor is a 1-4 player co-op survival horror game. Navigate your way through the procedurally generated manor, fend off monsters, solve puzzles and find a way to escape.



  • Limited Resources: Scavenge the manor for ammunition and health items to protect yourself from the monsters that lie within, but use them wisely as resources are limited.
  • Puzzles: Collect keys around the area to unlock new rooms, find more items and get access to a variety of different puzzles. Solve these puzzles to get one step closer to escaping.
  • Hardcore: Getting out alive won't be easy, there are no checkpoints and no saves. You only get one chance to escape, and you'll receive a final rank based on your performance.



  • Rooms: The layout of the manor is procedurally generated each time, so players must learn how to navigate through the area as they play.
  • Items: Keys, resources and other such items are spawned in different locations of the map for every playthrough. Search rooms carefully for everything you need to survive.
  • Enemies: Monsters are randomly selected and spawned around the area, so you never know what might be waiting for you on the other side of a door.
  • Locks: Doors can be assigned with various different lock types, or even without a lock entirely. Remember which keys are required and only carry what is needed.
  • Puzzles: Puzzles are chosen at random and their solutions are changed each time, which makes problem solving necessary to escape.



  • 4 Players: Play alone or with up to 3 other people, invite players to a private server only accessible to you and your friends.
  • Co-operative: Work together to escape and leave no one behind, share resources among each other to ensure everyone has a fighting chance.
  • Proximity Chat: Use the in-game proximity voice chat for the best experience, listen closely as your friends scream in the distance.
